comments.body: Thought it was a compromise to point people in the right direction as to why the recorder button had disappeared.

comments.body:
Could you start adding examples to the expected format and a more verbose explanation.
eg: 

> User data field map allows configuration how to populate user account fields (like email) from a record in ldap (once found).
> As an example, `{"cn":"name", "mail":"email"}` will choose a persion's human readable name from the `cn` attribute, and their email from the `mail` attribute. Available fields include name, and email.

Maybe this could be dynamically generated from the `config_server.coffee` types?
We sure could, unfortunately so many things to tackle, so little daytime :) Feel free to jump in and improve text labels if you please!

I would love to if I have some time. I have experience with angular+coffeecript+ldap so I should be able to help out.

How should I get started with _Meteor_ and developing _RocketChat_?
@gmsecrieru I submitted [!1310](https://github.com/RocketChat/Rocket.Chat/pull/1310) which should alleviate some of my concerns in this thread.
